extraction_prompt: I have a sports team named '{team}' playing '{sport}'. Return ONLY the specific league name (e.g. 'NBA', 'Premier League'). No extra words.
verification_prompt: Team: '{team}'. Predicted League: '{league}'. Sport: '{sport}'. Is this correct? Reply ONLY with 'CORRECT' if yes. If no, reply ONLY with the correct league name.
